data.actual_result: It displays the the search parameter from the last server along with the new parameter
data.expected_result: It should only display the option your clicked on
data.short_description: Search parameters from your last search in another server appear in another server when searching
data.steps_to_repro: - Go to any server - Search using the four search options but do not search for any keyword (like from:B a ™️ a n#7883) - Jump to any message - Go to another server  - Open the search page and click on any search option - Observe the text field
